famous_for: Hanuman Vyayam Shala (one of the oldest akhadas in India)

colleges.name: HVPM College of Engineering & Technology
colleges.description: A reputed engineering college under Hanuman Vyayam Prasarak Mandal, offering multiple engineering branches with emphasis on physical education and technology.

colleges.name: Sant Gadge Baba Amravati University (SGBAU)
colleges.description: The central state university of Amravati, named after Sant Gadge Baba, offering UG, PG, and PhD programs across multiple disciplines.

colleges.name: Government College of Pharmacy
colleges.description: One of Maharashtra’s top government pharmacy colleges, focusing on pharmaceutical education and drug research.

colleges.name: Government College of Engineering Amravati (GCOEA)
colleges.description: A premier government engineering institution established in 1964, affiliated to SGBAU, with strong placement records.

colleges.name: Prof. Ram Meghe Institute of Technology & Research (PRMITR)
colleges.description: A leading private institute offering engineering and management courses with modern infrastructure and strong industry links.

colleges.name: Sipna College of Engineering & Technology
colleges.description: A reputed private engineering college known for innovation, placements, and co-curricular activities.

colleges.name: Vidya Bharati Mahavidyalaya
colleges.description: A leading commerce and arts college in Amravati with focus on research, cultural activities, and academic excellence.

colleges.name: Shivaji Science College
colleges.description: One of the oldest science colleges in Amravati, known for quality science education and research programs.

colleges.name: Brijlal Biyani Science College
colleges.description: Popular for its science and arts courses, the college is affiliated with SGBAU and emphasizes student development.

colleges.name: P. R. Pote Patil Institute of Engineering & Management
colleges.description: A growing institute providing quality education in engineering and management with modern campus facilities.

schools.name: Podar International School
schools.description: One of the top CBSE schools in Amravati, known for modern facilities, smart classrooms, and extracurricular activities.

schools.name: School of Scholars (SOS)
schools.description: A well-established CBSE school chain with focus on academics and extracurricular growth of students.

schools.name: Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan's Public School
schools.description: Part of the Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan chain, offering holistic CBSE education with cultural values.

schools.name: Golden Kids English High School
schools.description: A popular English medium school in Amravati with state syllabus and focus on academics and sports.

schools.name: St. Francis High School
schools.description: One of the oldest convent schools in Amravati, offering quality education under the Maharashtra State Board.

hospitals.name: Irwin Hospital
hospitals.description: One of the oldest and most trusted hospitals in Amravati, providing multi-departmental healthcare services.

hospitals.name: Wadgaon Road Multispeciality Hospital
hospitals.description: A multispeciality hospital with ICU facilities, known for emergency care and surgical services.

hospitals.name: City Hospital
hospitals.description: A popular hospital for general healthcare and maternity services.

hospitals.name: Noble Hospital
hospitals.description: A specialized hospital in cardiology and neurology, located in central Amravati.

hospitals.name: Golden Care Hospital
hospitals.description: A family hospital focused on maternity and pediatrics with trusted doctors.

hospitals.name: Amravati Cancer Hospital
hospitals.description: A specialized cancer treatment hospital offering chemotherapy and oncology services.

influencers.name: Amravati Foodie (Rohit Joshi)
influencers.description: Popular local food vlogger known for reviewing street food and restaurants across Amravati. Often collaborates with local eateries.

influencers.name: Vidarbha Traveller (Nikhil Patil)
influencers.description: Travel influencer covering Chikhaldara, Melghat, and cultural sites of Vidarbha. Promotes eco-tourism in Amravati district.

influencers.name: Ankita Wankhede
influencers.description: Local fashion and beauty influencer, featured in regional magazines and campaigns. Supports women entrepreneurs in Amravati.

politicians.name: Navneet Rana
politicians.description: Current MP from Amravati, social activist turned politician. Works on issues like farmers' welfare and women's empowerment.

politicians.name: Anandrao Adsul
politicians.description: Veteran Shiv Sena leader from Amravati, served multiple terms in Lok Sabha. Known for his work in cooperative banking and labor rights.

politicians.name: Yashomati Thakur
politicians.role: Former Cabinet Minister (Women & Child Development, Maharashtra)
politicians.description: Senior Congress leader and MLA from Teosa. Played a significant role in women empowerment schemes in Maharashtra.

politicians.name: Dr. Sunil Deshmukh
politicians.description: Prominent politician in Amravati, served as State Minister. Known for development work in Badnera and education initiatives.

clothes.name: Gandhi Chowk Market
clothes.description: A popular market for sarees, dress materials, and traditional Vidarbha clothing.

clothes.name: Rajapeth Market
clothes.description: A busy street market with affordable clothes, shoes, and daily wear items.

clothes.name: Irwin Square Market
clothes.description: Trendy fashion market for youth, with boutique stores and branded outlets.

vegetables.name: Main Vegetable Market
vegetables.description: The biggest vegetable market in Amravati supplying fresh produce to local vendors.

vegetables.name: Chandur Bazaar
vegetables.description: Famous for large scale wholesale trade of vegetables and pulses.

electronics.name: Gopal Talkies Road
electronics.description: Hub of electronics shops dealing in mobiles, laptops, repair services, and accessories.

electronics.name: Gadge Nagar Market
electronics.description: A growing market area for electronics, home appliances, and gadgets.

wholesale.name: Cotton Market
wholesale.description: One of India’s oldest cotton markets, key hub for Vidarbha’s cotton trade.

wholesale.name: Grain Market
wholesale.description: A wholesale mandi for rice, wheat, pulses, and other agricultural produce.

shopping_malls.name: Reliance Mall
shopping_malls.description: A large retail shopping mall with Reliance Trends, Reliance Fresh, and digital outlets.

shopping_malls.name: Big Bazaar (Future Retail)
shopping_malls.description: One-stop destination for grocery and household shopping in central Amravati.

shopping_malls.name: D-Mart
shopping_malls.description: Popular supermarket for groceries, household items, and clothing at discounted prices.

food_places.name: Shankar Misal
food_places.description: Iconic spot in Amravati serving spicy and delicious Misal Pav, loved by locals and tourists.

food_places.name: Hotel Panchavati
food_places.description: A well-known family restaurant offering vegetarian thali and North Indian cuisine.

food_places.name: Sukhsagar Fast Food
food_places.description: Famous for Pav Bhaji and street food style snacks, loved by college students.

food_places.name: Swagat Restaurant
food_places.description: Popular for authentic South Indian dosa, idli, and filter coffee.

food_places.name: The Fusion Lounge
food_places.description: Trendy lounge serving Indian, Chinese, and continental food with modern ambiance.

food_places.name: Vrindavan Hotel
food_places.description: Family-friendly pure veg restaurant known for wholesome thalis.

food_places.name: Domino’s Pizza
food_places.description: Famous pizza chain with quick delivery across Amravati.

food_places.name: Burger King
food_places.description: International fast-food chain serving burgers, fries, and beverages.

transport.railway_station: Amravati Railway Station (Navi Amravati + Old Amravati)

local_slang: Kiti rate la milnar? (What’s the price?)
fun_facts: Home to India’s first women’s university proposal (back in British era).
Has one of the largest Hanuman temples in India.
Melghat Tiger Reserve is one of India’s first 9 Tiger Projects.
